description: Typsoft FTP Server 1.11, with "Sub Directory Include" enabled, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) by sending multiple RETR commands.  NOTE: it was later reported that 1.10 is also affected.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3294

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3296

description: Multiple integer overflows in OpenWBEM on SuSE Linux 9 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3297

description: Multiple buffer overflows in OpenWBEM on SuSE Linux 9 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3298

description: PHP file inclusion vulnerability in grab_globals.lib.php in phpMyAdmin 2.6.4 and 2.6.4-pl1 allows remote attackers to include local files via the $__redirect parameter, possibly involving the subform array.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3299

description: The register_globals emulation layer in grab_globals.php for phpMyAdmin before 2.6.4-pl3 does not perform safety checks on values in the _FILES array for uploaded files, which allows remote attackers to include arbitrary files by using direct requests to library scripts that do not use grab_globals.php, then modifying certain configuration values for the theme.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3300

description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpMyAdmin before 2.6.4-pl3 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via certain arguments to (1) left.php, (2) queryframe.php, or (3) server_databases.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3301

description: Eval injection vulnerability in bvh_import.py in Blender 2.36 allows attackers to execute arbitrary Python code via a hierarchy element in a .bvh file, which is supplied to an eval function call.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3302

description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in PHP-Nuke 7.8 allow remote attackers to modify SQL queries and execute arbitrary PHP code via (1) the username parameter in the Your Account page, (2) the url parameter in the Downloads module, and (3) the description parameter in the Web_Links module.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3304

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3305

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.php for FlatNuke 2.5.6 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the user parameter in a profile operation, a different vulnerability than CVE-2005-2814.  NOTE: it is possible that this XSS is a resultant vulnerability of CVE-2005-3307.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3306

description: Directory traversal vulnerability in index.php for FlatNuke 2.5.6 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via ".." sequences in the (1) user parameter in a profile operation or (2) quale parameter in a newtopic operation.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3307

description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Zomplog 3.4 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) name or (2) comment parameter in detail.php, (3) the username parameter in get.php, and (4) the search parameter in index.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3308

description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Zomplog 3.4 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via (1) the id parameter in detail.php and the catid parameter in (2) get.php and (3) index.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3309

description: Interpretation conflict in phpBB 2.0.17, with remote avatars and avatar uploading enabled, allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an HTML file with a GIF or JPEG file extension, which causes the HTML to be executed by a victim who views the file in Internet Explorer, which renders malformed image types as HTML, enabling cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.  NOTE: it could be argued that this vulnerability is due to a design flaw in Internet Explorer (CVE-2005-3312) and the proper fix should be in that browser; if so, then this should not be treated as a vulnerability in phpBB.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3310

description: BMC Software Control-M 6.1.03 for Solaris, and possibly other platforms, allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on temporary files.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3311

description: The HTML rendering engine in Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 allows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks via HTML in corrupted images and other files such as .GIF, JPG, and WAV, which is rendered as HTML when the user clicks on the link, even though the web server response and file extension indicate that it should be treated as a different file type.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3312

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3315

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3316

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2739

description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Finder Get Info window for Mac OS X 10.4 up to 10.4.2 causes Finder to misrepresent file and group ownership information.  NOTE: it is not clear whether this issue satisfies the CVE definition of a vulnerability.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2749

description: Software Update in Mac OS X 10.4.2, when the user marks all updates to be ignored, exits without asking the user to reset the status of the updates, which could prevent important, security-relevant updates from being installed.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2750

description: memberd in Mac OS X 10.4 up to 10.4.2, in certain situations, does not quickly synchronize access control checks with changes in group membership, which could allow users to access files and other resources after they have been removed from a group.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2751

description: An unspecified kernel interface in Mac OS X 10.4.2 and earlier does not properly clear memory before reusing it, which could allow attackers to obtain sensitive information, a different vulnerability than CVE-2005-1126 and CVE-2005-1406.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2752

description: Integer overflow in Apple QuickTime before 7.0.3 allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted MOV file that causes a sign extension of the length element in a Pascal style string.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2753

description: Integer overflow in Apple QuickTime before 7.0.3 allows user-assisted attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted MOV file with "Improper movie attributes."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2754

description: Apple QuickTime Player before 7.0.3 allows user-assisted attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted file with a missing movie attribute, which leads to a null dereference.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2755

description: Apple QuickTime before 7.0.3 allows user-assisted attackers to overwrite memory and execute arbitrary code via a crafted PICT file that triggers an overflow during expansion.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2756

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in CoreFoundation in Mac OS X and OS X Server 10.4 through 10.4.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown attack vectors involving "validation of URLs."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2757

description: Lynx 2.8.5, and other versions before 2.8.6dev.15, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via (1) lynxcgi:, (2) lynxexec, and (3) lynxprog links, which are not properly restricted in the default configuration in some environments.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2929

description: Unquoted Windows search path vulnerability in RealNetworks RealPlayer 10.5 6.0.12.1040 through 6.0.12.1348, RealPlayer 10, RealOne Player v2, RealOne Player v1, and RealPlayer 8 before 20060322 might allow local users to gain privileges via a malicious C:\program.exe file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2936

description: Unquoted Windows search path vulnerability in iTunesHelper.exe in iTunes 4.7.1.30 and iTunes 5 for Windows might allow local users to gain privileges via a malicious C:\program.exe file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2938

description: Unquoted Windows search path vulnerability in VMWare Workstation 5.0.0 build-13124 might allow local users to gain privileges via a malicious "program.exe" file in the C: folder.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2939

description: Unquoted Windows search path vulnerability in Microsoft Antispyware 1.0.509 (Beta 1) might allow local users to gain privileges via a malicious "program.exe" file in the C: folder, involving the programs (1) GIANTAntiSpywareMain.exe, (2) gcASNotice.exe, (3) gcasServ.exe, (4) gcasSWUpdater.exe, or (5) GIANTAntiSpywareUpdater.exe.  NOTE: it is not clear whether this overlaps CVE-2005-2935.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2940

description: libungif library before 4.1.0 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted GIF file that triggers a null dereference.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2974

description: io-xpm.c in the gdk-pixbuf XPM image rendering library in GTK+ before 2.8.7 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a crafted XPM image with a large number of colors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2975

description: Integer overflow in io-xpm.c in gdk-pixbuf 0.22.0 in GTK+ before 2.8.7 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or execute arbitrary code via an XPM file with large height, width, and colour values, a different vulnerability than CVE-2005-3186.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2976

description: The SELinux version of PAM before 0.78 r3 allows local users to perform brute force password guessing attacks via unix_chkpwd, which does not log failed guesses or delay its responses.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-2977

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in a shared library as used by the Volume Manager daemon (vmd) in VERITAS NetBackup Enterprise Server 5.0 MP1 to MP5 and 5.1 up to MP3A allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted packet.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3116

description: syslogtocern in Acme thttpd before 2.23 allows local users to write arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a temporary file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3124

description: Integer overflow in the GTK+ gdk-pixbuf XPM image rendering library in GTK+ 2.4.0 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via an XPM file with a number of colors that causes insufficient memory to be allocated, which leads to a heap-based buffer overflow.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2005-3186
